languages.text: "В последнее время я сталкиваюсь с ересью удивительно часто".
"I come across heresy surprisingly often these days."
languages.original_text: "В последнее время я сталкиваюсь с ересью удивительно часто".

traits.locale_text: "I come across heresy surprisingly often these days."

languages.text: “最近这段日子里，我隔三差五就能碰上异端分子。”
languages.original_text: "I come across heresy surprisingly often these days."

traits.locale_text: “最近这段日子里，我隔三差五就能碰上异端分子。”

languages.text: «Últimamente, soy testigo de un número sorprendente de herejías».
languages.original_text: "I come across heresy surprisingly often these days."

traits.locale_text: «Últimamente, soy testigo de un número sorprendente de herejías».

languages.text: 「最近は異端を見かけることが驚くほど多くなった」
languages.original_text: "I come across heresy surprisingly often these days."

traits.locale_text: 「最近は異端を見かけることが驚くほど多くなった」

languages.text: "Ich stoße derzeit überraschend häufig auf Ketzerei."
languages.original_text: "I come across heresy surprisingly often these days."

traits.locale_text: "Ich stoße derzeit überraschend häufig auf Ketzerei."

languages.text: « J'ai du mal à faire cent pas sans tomber sur des manifestations d'hérésie, ces derniers temps. »
languages.original_text: "I come across heresy surprisingly often these days."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai du mal à faire cent pas sans tomber sur des manifestations d'hérésie, ces derniers temps. »

languages.text: "Bu aralar kâfirliğe şaşırtıcı derecede sık denk geliyorum."
languages.original_text: "I come across heresy surprisingly often these days."

traits.locale_text: "Bugünlerde kâfirliğe şaşırtıcı derecede sık denk geliyorum."
